properties.areaDesc: South Central Elko County; Southern Lander County and Southern Eureka County; White Pine County; Northeastern Nye County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Southeastern Elko County
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 2 at 9:27PM PST until February 3 at 1:00AM PST by NWS Elko NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one
inch expected. Winds gusting as high as 60 mph.

* WHERE...Portions of north central, northeast and south central
Nevada.

* WHEN...Until 1 AM PST Monday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Areas
of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Strong
winds could cause tree damage.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will
cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads
and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM PST MONDAY
